column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Came here for dinner on the Fourth
column5: and with high expectations.  Although I'm utterly disdainful of the whole "tapas" fad in the U.S.
column6: the quality of the food here made up for it.  And for the course of one glorious mouth-watering meal
column7: I forgot that I was in a bourgeois yuppie Spanish-style theme park.
